mapper.select: SELECT b.com_index,b.board_index,m.m_nickname,b.com_text,b.com_good,b.com_index1,b.m_index,b.com_count,b.com_date FROM board_com b, member m where board_index = #{data} and com_index1 is null and b.m_index = m.m_index
SELECT b.com_index,b.board_index,m.m_nickname,b.com_text,b.com_good,b.com_index1,b.m_index,b.com_date FROM board_com b, member m where com_index1 = #{com_index} and b.m_index = m.m_index
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_com(com_index, com_text,board_index,m_index,com_count,com_date) VALUES(com_index.nextval,#{com_text},#{board_index},#{m_index},0,(select to_char(sysdate,'mm.dd hh24:mi') from dual))
mapper.update: update board_com set com_count = ( select DISTINCT(com_count) from board_com where com_index = #{index})+1 where com_index = #{index}
mapper.insert: insert into board_com(com_index, com_text, com_index1, board_index,m_index,com_date) values(com_index.nextval, #{com_text}, #{com_index1}, #{board_index},#{m_index},(select to_char(sysdate,'mm.dd hh24:mi') from dual))
